articles.title: Eritrea Observed World TB Day 2024 - WHO | Regional Office for Africa
articles.description: World TB Day was commemorated on 24 March 2024 at Orotta Conference Hall in Asmara, capital city of Eritrea. This year’s theme is “Yes, we can end TB,” highlighting the need to ensure equitable access to prevention and care, in line with our drive towards the…
